full_sentence: Of course radical Islam is not compatible, but many Muslims follow their faith by literally murdering people and oppressing women. Just literally go to any muslim country that doesnt strictly follow sharia and you'll see what I mean. They are just desert savages and sand monkeys

I arrived home and cars were lined up and down the street, and many perspective buyers all whom fit the bit of who i'd want to be living next to. The demographic of the neighborhood just got a whole lot better for the residents and their children. This family, who are moving out are the only ones to have committed any serious violent crime in the area in the few decades I've lived here. I came home from work one day and one of my neighbors was hosing off his walkway and there were a couple cop cars outside his house. I stopped to ask him what was going on. Apparently the crazy ex-wife went at the husband with a chef's knife and got him a few times in the chest. My neighbor, jolly as can be just casually washing all the coagulated blood of his walkway and stoop gave me the details. All in all I'm very pleased to have a safe area to live where neighbors say hello and have a chat, and there is no stabbings or trash in the yard.

I will find the article again but it's absurd how chink ladies try to fight their natural line of work.
